problem_text_cn: 如图,AD∥BE∥CF,直线l1,l2与这三条平行线分别交于点A,B,C,D,E,F,\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{2}{3},DE=6,则EF的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, straight line lN_0, lN_1 and these three parallel lines intersect at points A, B, C, D, E, F, \frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{N_0}{N_1},DE=N_2, then the value of EF is ( )
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行线分线段成比例:如果一条直线截三角形的两边(或两边的延长线)所得的对应线段成比例,那么这条直线平行于三角形的第三边．
